title: Frank Miller Absolute Torrent - All Comicbook Artwork -1978/2005
description:
ALL Frank Miller Comicbook Artwork, From 1978 to 2005.



1978 Twilight Zone #84  Art Only - "Royal Feast" short - 
                        First Frank Miller Comicbook work ever !
                        
     Twilight Zone #85  Art Only - "Endless Cloud" short

     WeirdWar #64       Art Only - "Deliver me from D day" short - First work at DC

1981 Amazing Spider-Man Art Only

1982 What if... #28     Art Only

1982 Wolverine          Art Only

1983 Ronin              Art & Stories

1986 DarkKnight returns Art & Stories

1987 Batman Year One    Stories Only

1987 Elektra Assassin   Stories Only

1990 Elektra LivesAgain Art & Stories

1990 Hardboiled         Stories Only

1991 DarkHorse presents 5th anniversary special

1991 Sin City           Art & Stories

1992 Robocop Terminator Stories Only

1993 Spawn #11          Stories Only

1995 BigGuy & Rusty     Stories Only

1995 Dark Horse Presents #100A #100B

1996 Dark Horse Presents #114

1997 Bad Boy            Stories Only

1998 300                Art & Stories

2001 DK Strikes Again   Art & Stories

2003 Robocop            Stories Only (from FM script wrote for Robocop2)

2005 Robin              Stories Only (8 on 12)


With this torrent u got Almost ALL Frank Miller Comicbook Artwork.

Almost, because i didnt put All the Comics with ONLY cover or central page made by FM.

Almost complete also because i'm missing those Comics :
1978 Weird war #68
1981 What if...#28
1983 Elektra saga #1 and #2
1990 Give me liberty (ALL !)
2007 All star Batman & Robin the boy wonder #9#10#11#12
2009 The Spirit Art and Storyboard
I Think i'm missing some Amazin Spider-man also !

Thanx if u can help me find those scans !
Feel free to put a link in the comments ;-)


All files are from previous TPB torrent, thx to ALL the community !

Thanx to the moebiusgraphics.com for the chronologie and the info.


In a futur torrent i will ad ALL Frank Miller Artwork on DareDevil. 
Look Out for "Frank Miller Absolute Torrent - All and Every Artwork on DareDevil" !
